title: LINUX CLIENT (RIOTER PLEASE READ!!!)
body: hello im creating this discussion because i want to beg the rioters to get it to the right people to introduce a linux friendly client for the main linux distros please please please, league is the only reason i stay on windows every other game i play has linux support

replies.body:
While there isn't official support for the client on Linux, *many players* have been able to utilize Wine or [PlayOnLinux](https://www.playonlinux.com/en/) to get the client working. 

I can't provide direct support for Linux, but if you have any questions specifically about those methods, I recommend reaching out on their [community forums](https://www.playonlinux.com/en/forums.html). Let me know if you have any questions.
